PROTOTYPE NAME:
io.ksonnet.pkg.configMap

DESCRIPTION:
A simple config map with optional user-specified data.

REQUIRED PARAMETERS:
  --name=<name> Name to give the configMap. [type: string]

OPTIONAL PARAMETERS:
  --data=<data> Data for the configMap. [default: {}, type: object]

TEMPLATE TYPES AVAILABLE:
  [jsonnet]
